parameters.name: Clsid
parameters.description: GUID or ProgID of the add-in as registered with SOLIDWORKS (see Remarks )

title: ISldWorks.GetAddInObject
description: Gets an add-in object for the specified SOLIDWORKS add-in.

parameters.name: Clsid
parameters.description: GUID or ProgID of the add-in as registered with SOLIDWORKS (see Remarks )

remarks:
To specify Clsid with:
a ProgID, read
Accessing SOLIDWORKS Add-in Objects
.
a GUID, use curly brackets as in "{
GUID
}", or the string is interpreted as a ProgID.
